tags.name: demo-wc-card
tags.description: This is a container looking like a card with a back and front side you can switch
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * This is a container looking like a card with a back and front side you can switch
 *
 * @slot - This is an unnamed slot (the default slot)
 * @fires side-changed - Fires whenever it switches between front/back
 * @cssprop --demo-wc-card-header-font-size - Header font size
 * @cssprop --demo-wc-card-front-color - Font color for front
 * @cssprop --demo-wc-card-back-color - Font color for back
 */

attributes.name: back-side
attributes.description: Indicates that the back of the card is shown

properties.name: backSide
properties.description: Indicates that the back of the card is shown

events.name: side-changed
events.description: Fires whenever it switches between front/back

slots.description: This is an unnamed slot (the default slot)
